articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Europe's measles cases rise 30-fold in 2023. This country worst hit - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Europe Measles Surge: The WHO Europe region counts 53 countries, including Russia and Central Asia.  | World News
articles.content:
Europe saw 30,000 measles cases last year, 30 times higher than for 2022, the World Health Organization said on Tuesday calling for an "urgent" vaccination campaign.
